title: The Best of BBC golf
brief_description: Golf lovers have been highly rewarded over the years by the excellent golf coverage of the BBC team. Now the greatest highlights have been recorded in one program. Alex Hay presents memorable moments from four decades of top international golf.
description: Golf lovers have been highly rewarded over the years by the excellent golf coverage of the BBC team. Now the greatest highlights have been recorded in one program. Alex Hay presents memorable moments from four decades of top international golf.
